Vizualization

Summary Vizualizations

Module for visualizing simulation results.

pymicrostructure.visualization.summary.participant_comparison(participants: List[Trader])[source]

Compare the position and profit history of a list of participants.

Parameters

participantsList[Trader]

A list of participants to compare.

pymicrostructure.visualization.summary.price_path(market: Market)[source]

Visualize the price path of a market.

Parameters

marketMarket

The market to visualize.

Returns

None
